entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
